name: City Escape (Spicy Churro)
description:
City Escape is a work in progress game, where a Mecha and a Kaiju are engaged in an epic battle in the floating manmade city of Neo Venice, you as the player... are just some guy who doesn't wanna die. 

Our little puzzle game is still a work in progress by a group of friends who love video games. We hope you enjoy the game, if you do, please give us any feedback you have. We plan to do more work on the game, though we're still not quite sure how big the final game will be, but every comment you leave will make the game that tiny bit better later on.

Thanks for checking us out!
